statements: SELECT * FROM online_assessment;
SELECT assessment_name, submission_time, grade FROM online_assessment;
SELECT student_id, assessment_name, grade FROM online_assessment WHERE submission_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM online_assessment ORDER BY submission_time DESC;
SELECT assessment_name, grade FROM online_assessment ORDER BY grade DESC;
SELECT * FROM online_assessment ORDER BY submission_time DESC, grade ASC
SELECT assessment_id, student_id, grade FROM online_assessment WHERE grade >= 80 ORDER BY grade DESC
SELECT assessment_name, submission_time FROM online_assessment WHERE student_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT * FROM online_assessment WHERE assessment_name LIKE '%Midterm%' AND grade BETWEEN 70 AND 90 ORDER BY submission_time DESC
SELECT DISTINCT student_id FROM online_assessment
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM Students ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT assignment_name, assignment_deadline FROM Assignments WHERE assignment_deadline >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY assignment_deadline DESC;
SELECT student_id, student_name, student_email FROM Students WHERE student_id = 3;
SELECT assignment_name as Assignment, student_name as Student FROM Assignments INNER JOIN Students ON Assignments.student_id = Students.student_id;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM Students WHERE student_id = 10;
SELECT student_name, assignment_name FROM Students JOIN Assignments ON Students.student_id = Assignments.student_id;
SELECT assignment_name, assignment_deadline FROM Assignments ORDER BY assignment_deadline DESC;
SELECT student_name, student_email, assignment_name FROM Students JOIN Assignments ON Students.student_id = Assignments.student_id WHERE Students.student_id = 20;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM Students;
SELECT assignment_name, due_date FROM Assignments;
SELECT student_name, score FROM Students JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id;
SELECT student_name, assignment_name, score FROM Students JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id JOIN Assignments ON Grades.assignment_id = Assignments.assignment_id;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT assignment_name, due_date FROM Assignments ORDER BY due_date DESC;
SELECT student_name, assignment_name, score FROM Students JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id WHERE score > 90;
SELECT AVG(score) AS average_score FROM Grades;
SELECT student_name, assignment_name, feedback FROM Students JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id WHERE feedback IS NOT NULL ORDER BY student_name, assignment_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT full_name, email FROM students WHERE student_id = 'b706939d-96b8-431f-84b3-5b8a5da62c4b';
SELECT title, description, deadline FROM assignments WHERE deadline > CURRENT_TIMESTAMP;

SELECT s.full_name, a.title, g.grade FROM students s JOIN submissions sub ON s.student_id = sub.student_id JOIN grades g ON sub.submission_id = g.submission_id JOIN assignments a ON sub.assignment_id = a.assignment_id;
SELECT AVG(grade) AS average_grade FROM grades;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT full_name, email FROM students ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT title, description FROM assignments WHERE deadline > NOW();
SELECT student_id, COUNT(submission_id) AS num_submissions FROM submissions GROUP BY student_id HAVING num_submissions > 5;
SELECT g.grade, g.feedback, s.full_name FROM grades g LEFT JOIN submissions s ON g.submission_id = s.submission_id;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT name, email FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM courses ORDER BY course_id DESC;
SELECT assignment_title, deadline, total_points FROM assignments WHERE course_id = 2;
SELECT submission_date, file_path FROM submissions WHERE student_id = 3 ORDER BY submission_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT name, email FROM students WHERE enrollment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM courses ORDER BY course_name ASC;
SELECT assignment_title, deadline, total_points FROM assignments WHERE deadline >= '2022-06-01' ORDER BY total_points DESC;

SELECT s.name AS student_name, c.course_name, g.grade FROM students s JOIN submissions sub ON s.student_id = sub.student_id JOIN assignments a ON sub.assignment_id = a.assignment_id JOIN grades g ON sub.submission_id = g.submission_id JOIN courses c ON a.course_id = c.course_id WHERE g.grade >= 80 ORDER BY g.grade DESC;
